alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 2:03PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN GUAM THROUGH 245 PM CHST... At 200 PM ChST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout near Umatac, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Waterspouts, landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Yona, Talofofo, Inarajan, Asan, Merizo, Piti, Santa Rita, and Umatac. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Tiyan Guam.
